data.name: BuildingPopover/commanderStatus/bodyStatus/foundation
data.value: Transport Industrial Resource or earn it in battles.

data.name: BuildingPopover/commanderStatus/bodyStatus/halfDestroy
data.value: Fill up the durability bar for the structure to function.

data.name: BuildingPopover/soldierStatus/bodyStatus/foundation
data.value: To finish building the structure, attach to its garrison and earn Industrial Resource.

data.name: BuildingPopover/soldierStatus/bodyStatus/halfDestroy
data.value: To repair structure, attach to its garrison and earn Industrial Resource.

data.name: Buildings/defResInfo/base_building
data.value: Open Zones allow to build structures, where Reserves are requested. Zones can be attacked by enemy clans.

data.name: Buildings/defResInfo/finance_building
data.value: to credits for all clan members after any battle.

data.name: Buildings/defResInfo/intendancy_building
data.value: to Industrial Resource kept after unsuccessful defense of Stronghold.

data.name: Buildings/defResInfo/tankodrom_building
data.value: to Combat Experience for all clan members after any battle.

data.name: Buildings/defResInfo/training_building
data.value: to crew experience for all clan members after any battle.

data.name: Buildings/defResInfo/trophy_building
data.value: to plunder after successful attack on enemy Stronghold.

data.name: Buildings/defResInfo/warSchool_building
data.value: to Free Experience for all clan members after any battle.

data.name: Buildings/modernizationDescr/base_building
data.value: available after upgrade of other structures in Stronghold.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/car_building
data.value: Enables clan members to earn up to 25% of extra plunder in Skirmishes. Percentage can be increased depending on Reserve level.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/finance_building
data.value: Clan members earn up to 50% additional credits in any battle. Percentage can be increased depending on Reserve level.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/intendancy_building
data.value: Decreases by up to 50% the loss of Industrial Resource after unsuccessful defense. Percentage retained depends on Reserve level.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/tankodrom_building
data.value: Clan members earn up to 50% additional experience in any battle. Percentage can be increased depending on Reserve level.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/training_building
data.value: Reserve of maximum level doubles crew experience earned in any battle.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/trophy_building
data.value: Enables clan members to earn up to 50% extra Industrial Resource in Advances. Percentage can be increased depending on Reserve level.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/warSchool_building
data.value: On the maximum level, Reserve doubles Free Experience earned after any battle.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/built
data.value: всем бойцам ++++ ++ длиннове описание built !!!!! д++++++ ддл иии иии ::: выделяет дополнительные средства для выплаты жалования

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/car_building
data.value: Mechanics of the Transportation Unit can attach a trailer to any tractor, increasing the amount of any transported cargo.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/finance_building
data.value: The Financial Unit is responsible for all accounting in the Stronghold. Officers of the Financial Unit attract additional funds to increase the monetary allowance of clan members.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/intendancy_building
data.value: Officers of the Quartermaster Unit arrange efficient evacuation of equipment within the Stronghold, ensuring that the clan can quickly replenish its forces after an unsuccessful defense.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/notAvailable
data.value: всем бойцам ++ ++++ длиннове описание notAvailable !!!!! д++++++ д длиии выделяет дополнительные средства для выплаты жалования

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/tankodrom_building
data.value: Special area designed to determine vehicles' efficiency under ultimate load.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/training_building
data.value: Combination of theoretical and practical studies allows recruits to quickly master the basics of military science.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/trophy_building
data.value: After a successful attack on an enemy Stronghold, the Trophy Brigade retrieves abandoned vehicles, resources, and other valuables.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/warSchool_building
data.value: Experienced instructors and thematic materials from the library facilitate the training of skilled officers ready for fighting in any conditions.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/car_building
data.value: Additional Industrial Resource earned in Skirmishes

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/intendancy_building
data.value: Decreases amount of enemy plunder after unsuccessful defense

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/tankodrom_building
data.value: Additional Combat Experience after any battle

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/training_building
data.value: Additional crew experience after any battle

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/trophy_building
data.value: Increases amount of plunder earned after successful attack

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/warSchool_building
data.value: Additional Free Experience after any battle

data.name: BuildingsProcess/textInfo
data.value: Select a structure from the list on the left to see the detailed description.

data.name: ChoiceDivision/description
data.value: Division limits the maximum tier of vehicles and the amount of plunder that can be earned in Skirmishes by a detachment.

data.name: CongratulationWindow/textBody
data.value: %(sourceCount)s (units of Industrial Resource) added to storage in your Command Center. This amount is enough to build one structure and prepare one Reserve. This time you were given Industrial Resource for free. However, in the future you will need to earn it in Skirmishes and Advances.

data.name: DemountBuilding/generalText/body
data.value: You %(bodyInnerText)s all prepared Reserves and Industrial Resource accumulated in the structure. The structure will be rebuilt from the foundation.

data.name: DemountBuilding/question/body
data.value: To complete this action, enter the exact value displayed in the structure durability bar (%(controlNumber)s).

data.name: FixedPlayers/header/isAssigned
data.value: You are attached to the structure

data.name: FortDirectionsWindow/button/newDirection/tooltip/disabled/descr
data.value: At least %(count)d clan members required to open a Zone.

data.name: FortDirectionsWindow/button/newDirection/tooltip/enabled/descr
data.value: Zone allows the building of new structures and establishment of bridgeheads for attacks on enemy Strongholds. Make sure that each Zone is protected during Defense Hour.

data.name: FortDirectionsWindow/descr/completed
data.value: Congratulations! You have opened the maximum number of Zones.

data.name: FortDirectionsWindow/descr/requirements
data.value: To open a new Zone, at least %(count)s clan members are required.

data.name: FortIntelligence/bottomBlock/body
data.value: Your Stronghold can be attacked too. Mobilize your Reserves and be on your guard when the time comes to repel the enemy.

data.name: FortIntelligence/headerBlock/body
data.value: Strongholds of at least Level V get access to intelligence data, which can help the clan to locate an enemy and launch an attack.

data.name: FortIntelligence/middleBlock/body
data.value: Victory in an Advance will earn more plunder than Skirmishes, and will also benefit the reputation of your clan.

data.name: FortIntelligence/topBlock/body
data.value: Examine Strongholds of enemy clans to choose a suitable target for attack. Keep in mind that others can also locate your Stronghold.

data.name: FortIntelligence/windowTitle
data.value: Intelligence Data: Select Clan for Attack

data.name: FortMainView/commonTutor/title
data.value: Step 2 of 3. Lay the foundation of your first structure.

data.name: FortMainView/directions/selectingStatus
data.value: Choose a Zone to create a bridgehead. You can control Zones from the Command Center.

data.name: FortMainView/directionsTutor/title
data.value: Step 1 of 3. Choose a Zone you wish to open.

data.name: FortMainView/transporting/exportingStatus
data.value: Choose the structure from which Industrial Resource will be transported.

data.name: FortMainView/transporting/importingStatus
data.value: Choose the structure to which Industrial Resource will be transported.

data.name: FortMainView/transporting/tutorialDescr
data.value: To complete building of your first structure, enter Transportation mode.

data.name: FortMainView/transportingTutor/title
data.value: Step 3 of 3. Fill storage of the structure with Industrial Resource.

data.name: FortWelcomeCommanderView/option1/descr
data.value: Open a Zone and build your first structure there. Reserves requested from structures provide significant advantages to the clan in battles.

data.name: FortWelcomeCommanderView/option2/descr
data.value: Each structure is assigned a garrison of clan members. Garrisons serve as a basis for creating detachments, which earn Industrial Resource in Skirmishes. Clan members will earn Industrial Resource for the structure they are attached to.

data.name: FortWelcomeCommanderView/option3/descr
data.value: Industrial Resource earned in Skirmishes can be used to request Reserves. Once a Reserve is activated, it lasts for a limited time and affects all clan members. Reserve efficiency increases with structure level.

data.name: FortWelcomeView/bonuses/body
data.value: Accumulate resources to upgrade structures and request Reserves, which can turn the tide of a desperate battle.

data.name: FortWelcomeView/buildingAndUpgrading/body
data.value: Create impenetrable defenses with unique structures and repel any enemy clan.

data.name: FortWelcomeView/requirementClan
data.value: Only clans can own Strongholds. You are not yet a member of any clan.

data.name: FortWelcomeView/requirementCommander
data.value: Stronghold can be created only by the Commander of the clan

data.name: FortWelcomeView/warForResources/body
data.value: Declare war on other clans and attack their Strongholds to requisition Industrial Resource.

data.name: Modernization/conditions/fortMaxLevel
data.value: Maximum level of Command Center in the current update reached.

data.name: clanStats/params/sortie/avgDefres/tooltip/body
data.value: Ratio of total Industrial Resource earned to total Skirmishes conducted

data.name: clanStats/params/sortie/battlesCount/tooltip/body
data.value: Total number of Skirmishes conducted, including: • Victories: %(value_0)s • Defeats: %(value_1)s • Draws: %(value_2)s

data.name: clanStats/params/sortie/defres/lootInSorties/label
data.value: Total amount of Industrial Resource earned in Skirmishes

data.name: clanStats/params/sortie/wins/tooltip/body
data.value: Total rate of victories in Skirmishes

data.name: disconnected/WarningDescriptionCenterUnavailable
data.value: Stronghold is temporarily unavailable. Try again later.

data.name: disconnected/WarningDescriptionRoaming
data.value: Stronghold is unavailable in roaming. To get access to Stronghold, go to your region.

data.name: sortie/introView/descr
data.value: To upgrade your Stronghold and prepare Reserves, you must spend Industrial Resource. Earn it in Skirmishes or Advances.

data.name: sortie/introView/fortBattles/descr
data.value: Attack on enemy Stronghold or defense of your own Stronghold.

data.name: sortie/introView/sortie/descr
data.value: Battle with a random enemy clan on neutral territory.

data.name: sortie/listView/description
data.value: Earn Industrial Resource in battles with random enemy clans on neutral territory to upgrade your Stronghold.

data.name: sortie/listView/enterText

data.name: sortie/listView/notSelected

data.value: Created detachment fights a battle with a random enemy clan on neutral territory. Vehicle tier is determined by the division selected.

data.value: Total tier of vehicles is exceeded while some slots are available.

data.value: Select a vehicle to engage in Skirmish. Red indicator marks vehicles not ready for battle.

data.value: Defense overwhelmed! Repair your Command Center.

data.value: Level V Command Center and set up defense

data.name: Orders/orderPopover/specialMission/description
data.value: Activate Reserve to receive Special Instructions. There are various missions and rewards on each activation.

data.name: Orders/orderPopover/specialMission/shortDescr
data.value: To receive the award, complete Special Instructions from the War Department.

data.name: Orders/specialMission/possibleAward/description/level/3

data.name: Orders/specialMission/possibleAward/description/level/5

data.name: Orders/specialMission/possibleAward/description/level/8

data.name: SettingsDayoffPopover/description
data.value: The new Ceasefire day will come into effect in 14 days.

data.name: SettingsDefenceHourPopover/description
data.value: The new Defense Period will come into effect in 14 days.

data.name: SettingsPeripheryPopover/description
data.value: Detachments for Advances will be created on the selected server. You can select a different server once per 14 days.

data.name: SettingsVacationPopover/description
data.value: Neutrality can be declared only in two weeks. Advances are unavailable during the Neutrality.

data.name: SettingsVacationPopover/vacationDuration
data.value: 2. Set the duration of the Neutrality:

data.name: SettingsVacationPopover/vacationStart
data.value: 1. Set the time when the Neutrality begins:

data.name: SettingsWindow/blockDescr/defencePeriodTime
data.value: You have to defend your Stronghold against attacks by enemy clans at the appointed time every day, except the declared day of Ceasefire and Neutrality.

data.name: SettingsWindow/blockDescr/vacation
data.value: A period of 3 to 14 days during which you cannot be attacked. Unused days will be lost irrevocably. Can be declared after 90 days have passed since the end of the current Neutrality.

data.name: SettingsWindow/blockDescr/weekEnd
data.value: You can declare one Ceasefire day per week. During that day enemies cannot attack you, but you can attack them.

data.name: SettingsWindow/notActivated/description
data.value: By setting up the defense, you will be able to manually select an enemy, attack their Stronghold, and capture Industrial Resource. An attack on the selected clan will earn you more Industrial Resource than a random Skirmish. To gain a flawless victory, attack the selected Zone and capture the enemy Command Center.

data.name: ToolTipBuildingInfo/destroyedMessage
data.value: You cannot clash over a damaged structure (durability below %(value)s).

data.name: ToolTipBuildingInfo/lowLevelMessage
data.value: You cannot clash over structures of Level %(minLevel)s–%(maxLevel)s.

data.name: clanStats/params/periodDefence/avgDefres/tooltip/body
data.value: Ratio of Industrial Resource earned to Industrial Resource lost in Advances

data.name: clanStats/params/periodDefence/wins/tooltip/body
data.value: Total rate of victories in Advances

data.name: disableDefencePeriodWindow/inputChecker/body
data.value: To perform this operation, enter the current amount of Industrial Resource in all storages (%(controlNumber)s)

data.name: disableDefencePeriodWindow/mainText/body
data.value: • Level of all Reserves and structures including the Command Center higher than Level IV %(redText)s. • Number of prepared Reserves will not change.

data.name: disableDefencePeriodWindow/mainText/bodyRedText
data.value: will be reduced to Level IV

data.name: disableDefencePeriodWindow/mainText/title
data.value: Are you sure you want to disable the Stronghold defense?

data.name: fortBattleResultsWindow/defeat/description/start
data.value: Advance ended, pillaged structures of clan

data.name: fortBattleResultsWindow/win/description/start
data.value: Advance ended, pillaged structures of clan

data.name: fortBattleRoom/legionariesToolTipMsg
data.value: Please wait for the Commander to add you to the detachment.

data.name: fortNotCommanderFirstEnterWindow/textDescription
data.value: • Select a structure and attach to its garrison. Industrial Resource earned by you will be used to upgrade the selected structure (you are attached to the Command Center by default). • Engage in Skirmishes with the members of your clan. Earn Industrial Resource for upgrading your Stronghold and producing Reserves. Be ready for the Defense Period. • Distribute Industrial Resource evenly in all storages. If the storage of a structure is full, you will not be able to transport more Industrial Resource there.

data.name: periodDefenceWindow/btn/pointsAreFilled/body
data.value: Click to activate defense of your Stronghold. You can adjust the defense settings later.

data.name: periodDefenceWindow/btn/pointsAreNotFilled/body
data.value: To set up the defense select a server, set the time for the Defense Period and Ceasefire.

data.name: periodDefenceWindow/holiday/description
data.value: During this day enemy clans cannot attack your Stronghold, but you can attack other clans.

data.name: periodDefenceWindow/hourDefence/description
data.value: Each day at this hour your clan must defend your Stronghold. Set a time convenient for you.

data.name: periodDefenceWindow/notNow/body
data.value: You can always set up the defense in the Stronghold settings.

data.name: periodDefenceWindow/periphery/description
data.value: Detachments for Advances will be created here.

data.name: periodDefenceWindow/ready
data.value: Fill out the form to set up the defense.

data.name: sortie/room/message/getNotReady
data.value: Click to indicate that you are not ready

data.name: FortIntelligence/clanDescription/attackImpossible

data.name: FortIntelligence/headerBlockNoDefPeriod/body
data.value: To access the Intelligence Data, upgrade your Command Center to Level V and set up the defense.

data.value: Suitable enemy was not found. Try searching by tag or adjusting the search range manually.

data.name: sortie/listView/alertText/body

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/artillery_building
data.value: Enables to call in an artillery strike. Its damage is determined by the level of the Reserve.

data.name: Buildings/processOrderInfo/bomber_building
data.value: Enables to call in an airstrike. Its damage is determined by the level of the Reserve.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/artillery_building
data.value: A distant artillery battery will immediately lay howitzer fire on enemy positions, causing serious damage with HE shells.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/longDescr/bomber_building
data.value: Attack Bomber Squadrons supplies expeditionary airfields with aircraft, ready to unleash a fiery storm on the enemy.

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/artillery_building
data.value: Call in an artillery strike at the specified coordinates

data.name: BuildingsProcess/shortDescr/bomber_building
data.value: Call in a ground-attack plane for airstrike

data.name: fortCombatReservesIntroWindow/artillery/description
data.value: Artillery battery, hidden from the enemy, stands ready to lay heavy artillery fire with HE shells at the specified coordinates on the map at first request.

data.name: fortCombatReservesIntroWindow/bomber/description
data.value: A ground-attack plane will drop ATA bombs capable of causing heavy damage to any enemy vehicle that happens to be located at the specified map coordinates.

data.name: fortCombatReservesIntroWindow/description

data.name: fortConsumableOrder/descr/11
data.value: Artillery fire covers the specified coordinates on the minimap. Shells in use—High-Explosive.

data.name: fortConsumableOrder/descr/12
data.value: A ground-attack plane is directed to the specified coordinates and drops anti-tank aerial bombs (ATAB). This plane cannot be shot down.
